OneLineDescription: Customizable Archery Physics for any load order. No mods required.
LongDescription:
Comprehensive archery physics overhaul contained in a single patcher.
Also fixes a whole host of bugs and inconsistencies not included in any other archery mod such as detection, arrows colliding with the air in front of you, arrows falling out of your bow even at full draw, the "Ninja Dodge" bug, and more!

The default settings are adequate for most users, but if you want to experiment, nearly every setting is exposed through the Synthesis GUI.
Settings documentation can be found here: https://github.com/Synthesis-Collective/Another-Archery-Patcher/wiki/Settings-Documentation

Nexus Page:	 https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/53810
